definitions.definition: A divided highway , especially one whose intersections and direct access to adjacent properties have been eliminated .

definitions.label_groups: Canada , parts of the US , Malaysia , Singapore , South Korea , Philippines

definitions.definition: A road built for high speed traffic , but not up to motorway standards or designated a motorway.

main_definition: ( US , regional ) A divided highway , especially one whose intersections and direct access to adjacent properties have been eliminated .
secondary_definitions: ( Canada , parts of the US , Malaysia , Singapore , South Korea , Philippines ) Synonym of freeway .
( UK , New Zealand ) A road built for high speed traffic , but not up to motorway standards or designated a motorway.
